No sign up required! Get started immediately. Create interactive demos in seconds using AI.

InteractiveDemo.ai is the fastest way to create interactive demos. 

AI Generated Informational Popovers

Automatically extracts keyframes out of the video and sends them over to a large language model then runs a second pass once the results come back.

Flexible Click-to-Pause Interaction

Create demos that pause at each click or play through seamlessly. Empower viewers to absorb information at their own pace or get a quick overview.

Animated Feature Popovers

Elevate your product walkthrough with stunning animated popovers and synthetic voiceovers. Showcase how your app solves real customer pain points at crucial steps.

Smart Focus

Enhance screen recordings with intelligent zoom that follows your mouse. Ensure your audience never misses important details during key actions.

Natural Physics

Bring your interface to life with fluid, physics-based motion. Every transition is smooth and engaging right out of the box.

Custom styling

Customize backgrounds with wallpapers, colors, or gradients. Fine-tune margins, corners, and shadows to match your site perfectly.

Eye-Catching cursors

Optional SVG cursors and animated click indicators add a professional flair to your demos

Perfect for:
- Marketers crafting compelling product presentations
- Sales teams demonstrating software features
- Product managers showcasing new updates
- Developers explaining technical concepts
- Customer support creating intuitive tutorials
- Everyone!
